entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
